errors.error_description: The yum repository configuration hardcodes the CentOS version to '7' in the baseurl, which will cause it to fail on CentOS 8 and 9. It should use the `$releasever` variable.
correction_candidates: In the baseurl, replace 'el/7' with 'el/$releasever' to support multiple CentOS versions.
Update the baseurl to use the '$releasever' variable for dynamic version detection, i.e., '.../el/$releasever/$basearch'.
errors.golden_answer: In the baseurl, replace 'el/7' with 'el/$releasever' to support multiple CentOS versions.
